cause.description: Because the United States is responsible for nearly one quarter of the world’s greenhouse gas pollution, it is critical that we acknowledge our contribution to global warming and work to begin to address this growing crisis, both within and outside our borders. Just in case you didn't know, you can join Friends of the Earth's Facebook Group and receive updates on different actions you can take to protect the environment. Check out Friends of the Earth's Facebook Group 1. Global warming is accelerating due to human actions 2. Global warming will cause massive ecological, social and economical problems 3. Global warming must be stopped
cause.name: Global Warming
